channel.title: MuscleScape [ALLSTAR BASED]
channel.description:
This is a brand new server, based off of allstar source. I do not yet have a client specifically for this server so I recommend using Galkon's client which can be downloaded here http://www.mediafire.com/download/eisygyml2js/Galkons+Client.rar
What I have to offer
Working skills Custom items Strength and mage/range guild Shops(Working but under construction) Working barrows (Also under construction) Pkbox Team Pking Training Area(Also under construction) Mini Game to get a godsword, this will be replaced with Godwars in the future
What I need
I need a coder and staff members Forums with working vote system Working donation system to keep the server live Donation symbol Pvp Armors (Vesta, Stat, Morrigans, Zuriels)
Hope to see new players in game soon! Have fun. The server ip is musclescape.no-ip.biz

item.title: MuscleScape [ALLSTAR BASED]
item.dc:creator: @killa_kronic killa kronic
item.description:
@killa_kronic wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:2, topic:555071”]I’ll hang around since i’m an allstar addict.
Anyways most people are going to complain since you have no jar client, you might want to look into it.

It’s also offline.[/quote]

I agree with Wimstr but your server is pretty much blank. You have got features that pretty much don’t work and your combat is very weak. Nothing works here but I am willing to help you if you want but you should work on the server before advertising. It’s like me posting a server with nothing in it just the simple stuff.

Read full topic
